name: Runaway - A Story of Progression
description:
This is a progression story of an abandoned project I started about a year ago. It all started when I got the Advanced Locomotion System, which was more of a template for my learning experience in Unreal Engine. This is a brief history of stuff I added over time while learning Unreal Engine.

The video on this page is of the abandoned version, in other words, what I had before the jam. The person who made the video was also my Beta tester, so sub to him.

P.S. DO NOT ragdoll if you plan on colliding with the respawn portal, or any portal for that matter.
